name: snake-game-typescript
description: A snake game written using TypeScript as part of learning.

scripts.build: tsc && sass src/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/*/* dist/
scripts.prod: tsc && sass --no-source-map src/scss/style.scss dist/css/style.css && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/*/* dist/
